Package main

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
main.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
This class creates members and methods for Inventory objects.

  • Method Details

    • addPart

      public static void addPart(Part newPart)
      The method for adding Parts to the allParts observable list.
      Parameters:
      newPart - the new Part to add

    • addProduct

      public static void addProduct(Product newProduct)
      The method for adding Products to the allProducts observable list.
      Parameters:
      newProduct - the new Product to add

    • lookupPart

      public static Part lookupPart(int partId)
      The method for looking up a Part in the allParts observable list by partID. This method iterates through the allParts list and compares the passed in partID with current Part object's partId.
      Parameters:
      partId - the partId to look up
      Returns:
      either null or the Part corresponding to the passed in partId

    • lookupProduct

      public static Product lookupProduct(int productId)
      The method for looking up a Product in the allProducts observable list by productID. This method iterates through the allProducts list and compares the passed in productID with current Product object's productId.
      Parameters:
      productId - the productId to look up
      Returns:
      either null or the Product corresponding to the passed in productId

    • lookupPart

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupPart(String partName)
      The method for looking up a Part in the allParts observable list by partName. This method iterates through the allParts list and compares the passed in string with current Part object's partName. If the string contains the full or partial partName it is added to a new observable list.
      Parameters:
      partName - the partId to look up
      Returns:
      namedPart observable list

    • lookupProduct

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> lookupProduct(String productName)
      The method for looking up a Product in the allProducts observable list by productName. This method iterates through the allProducts list and compares the passed in string with current Product object's productName. If the string contains the full or partial productName it is added to a new observable list.
      Parameters:
      productName - the productName to look up
      Returns:
      namedProduct observable list

    • updatePart

      public static void updatePart(int index, Part selectedPart)
      The method for updating a Part in the allParts observable list. A Part object and its index are passed into the method to update the allParts observable list.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the Part to update
      selectedPart - the Part to update

    • updateProduct

      public static void updateProduct(int index, Product selectedProduct)
      The method for updating a Product in the allProducts observable list. A Product object and its index are passed into the method to update the allProducts observable list.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the Product to update
      selectedProduct - the Product to update

    • deletePart

      public static boolean deletePart(Part selectedPart)
      The method for deleting a Part from the allParts observable list. A Part object is passed into the method, if the Part is null the method return false otherwise the method removes it from allParts and returns true.
      Parameters:
      selectedPart - the Part to delete
      Returns:
      false if the Part is null, returns true if the Part was deleted

    • deleteProduct

      public static boolean deleteProduct(Product selectedProduct)
      The method for deleting a Product from the allProducts observable list. A Product object is passed into the method, if the Product is null the method return false otherwise the method removes it from allProducts and returns true. If the Product has Parts in the associatedParts observable list the user is alerted and the product is not deleted.
      Parameters:
      selectedProduct - the Part to delete
      Returns:
      false if the Part is null, returns true if the Product was deleted

    • getAllParts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> getAllParts()
      The getter method for the allParts observable list.
      Returns:
      allParts observable list.

    • getAllProducts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getAllProducts()
      The getter method for the allProducts observable list.
      Returns:
      allProducts observable list.

    • addTestData

      public static void addTestData()
